pullRequest.title: Require python3-tornado only for SLE15/SLE15SP1/openSUSE Leap 15.1 (bsc#1169865)
pullRequest.bodyText:
What does this PR change?
Require python3-tornado only for SLE15/SLE15SP1/openSUSE Leap 15.1 (bsc#1169865)
Since tornado is vendored with salt 3000, we don't need it anymore. However we must keep it for SLE15/SLE15SP1 and openSUSE Leap 15.2 as we won't have salt3000 until SLE15SP2 and openSUSE Leap 15.2 are published, and we will have Uyuni releases and SUSE Manager releases before that happens.
GUI diff
No difference.

 DONE

Documentation


No documentation needed: No, bugfix.


 DONE


Test coverage


No tests: Should be covered by cucumber, FMPOV. But we don't have SP2 yet.


 DONE


Links
SUSE/spacewalk#11275

 DONE

Changelogs
If you don't need a changelog check, please mark this checkbox:

 No changelog needed

If you uncheck the checkbox after the PR is created, you will need to re-run changelog_test (see below)
Re-run a test
If you need to re-run a test, please mark the related checkbox, it will be unchecked automatically once it has re-run:

 Re-run test "changelog_test"
 Re-run test "backend_unittests_pgsql"
 Re-run test "java_lint_checkstyle"
 Re-run test "java_pgsql_tests"
 Re-run test "ruby_rubocop"
 Re-run test "schema_migration_test_oracle"
 Re-run test "schema_migration_test_pgsql"
 Re-run test "susemanager_unittests"
 Re-run test "javascript_lint"
 Re-run test "spacecmd_unittests"
